page.title: 13School Raises 1600 pounds.
page.content: Great Horwood School has raised over 1600 pounds this year. Nearly {1000 pounds} was raised to help purchase school equipment, including a computer. This money was raised by a sponsored event by bouncing on an inflatable dragon. Children and some members of staff bounced for one minute. They were sponsored for the number of bounces they could achieve in this time. Some children managed over 150 bounces. The second event was also a sponsored event, a Readathon. Children were sponsored for the number of books which they could read over the half-term holiday. The money raised by this nationally organised event was for the {World Wildlife Fund}. Great Horwood's contribution was {#610.75}.
